headline: Will L3Harris (LHX) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
summary: L3Harris (LHX) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

headline: L3Harris Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: MELBOURNE, Fla., January 23, 2026--The Board of Directors of L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) has approved an increase in the company’s per share quarterly cash dividend rate from $1.20 to $1.25 commencing with the dividend for the first quarter of the year, payable March 20, 2026, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on March 6, 2026. The dividend corresponds to an increase in the annualized rate from $4.80 to $5.00.

headline: L3Harris Technologies Raises Quarterly Dividend by 4% to $1.25

headline: Defense Stocks Ride High as Global Security Frays. 7 Stocks to Own.
summary: Greenland, NATO, Venezuela, Iran—not a day goes by that global security doesn’t seem to be fraying.  It should be more fuel for defense stocks.  Global military spending exceeded $2.5 trillion in 2025.
